values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_9
values.value:
The fastest mode of travel in Westeros is by dragonback, a privilege few have experienced since before the fall of House Targaryen. That Daenerys would trust Jon to ride one of her dragons shows how much their relationship has grown. The fact that Rhaegal allows him him to approach without protest is perhaps even more meaningful. The dragons may recognize something that Jon has yet to understand himself...

Craft any Season VIII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Married in Secret event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VIII Gear Sets: Ironborn Captain, Laughing Knight, Citadel Inquisitor, Fledgling Squire, Winter Survivor, Storm Lord, Iron Keyholder

Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_DRAGON_61
values.value: Craft gear for your Dragon with this trove of ancient schematics!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA2_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The weight of knowledge is a heavy burden, but someone must bear it.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Perception II event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA2_PVE_1
values.value:
A single well-placed strike can turn the tide of battle. Know your enemy's weakness and exploit it.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Three-Eyed Raven: Intuition II event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From the most unlikely of contenders, a Lord can ascend to the summit of power and glory. For 24 hours, they put everything on the line against rival Lords, risking their name for the promise of glory, and perhaps even infamy. The opportunity is yours to seize, to enter the crucible, and test your mettle against other mighty Lords from other kingdoms. Journey forth and claim a Seat of Power, defend it with all your might and inscribe your name in the annals of history. In the end, your actions will judge your valor by how long you're capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, others are vying for glory. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STARTEVENT
values.value:
Lords from across multiple kingdoms compete against each other by taking and holding Seats of Power! This competition is bracketed by Lord level, providing a neutral kingdom where players of similar power can participate in the event to earn points and rewards. Players can only join the neutral kingdom that is appropriate for their level and they can return to their home kingdom at any point during the event. At the end of the event, lords will automatically return to their home kingdoms. 
Special buffs are provided to those traveling to the neutral kingdom, protecting their troops from dying and also providing combat bonuses for attacking and defending Seats of Power. In this event, the number of troops, type of gear, gear quality, and strategic timing will make all the difference.

Event Rules
-> Capture Seats of Power in the new kingdom to gain event points.
-> Seats will lock and unlock on a schedule.
-> At the end of the event, the top players will be rewarded the best rewards.

Good luck and thank you for playing Games of Thrones: Conquest
